all_findings.title: Potential Price Manipulation via Balance

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on testMintToEOA()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function testMintToEOA(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

all_findings.title: Potential Read-Only Reentrancy Risk
all_findings.description: Contract has view functions that query external balances. Verify these don't enable read-only reentrancy attacks. Common in liquidity pools where price calculations use spot balances.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Ensure view functions that read external state are safe. Use reentrancy locks even on view functions if they influence critical logic. Consider caching values instead of live queries.

attack_vectors.description: Oracle manipulation vulnerabilities

ml_reasoning: Only one tool detected this issue
